task_units.name: Explore deals and promotions
sub_actions: SELECT: Specific deal or promotion category
VIEW: Details of selected deal or promotion

task_units.name: Access account or order information
sub_actions: CLICK: Account or Order Status section
TYPE: Order number or account identifier
TYPE: Email or phone number associated with the account

task_units.name: Browse products or services with specific filters
sub_actions: CLICK: Category or section of interest
SELECT: Filter options (e.g., price range, size, stock status)

task_units.name: Search for information or assistance
sub_actions: TYPE: Search query related to the issue
SELECT: Relevant help topic or question
